CONTRACT_ID: W6896-22S094 - Electrical Installation, Repairs and Maintenance
short_summary: Installation, Repairs and Maintenance of Electrical Systems
description: This contract will provide standing offer for installation, repairs and maintenance of electrical systems for Real Property Operations Group (West) (RPOps(W)) – Det Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba. Services are to be provided on an as and when required basis in accordance with specification attached. It is anticipated that only 1 firm will be issued a standing offer.
full_summary:
### Wanted: Electrical Installation, Repairs, and Maintenance Services

**Reference Number**: WS3561330998-Doc3626681730
**Solicitation Number**: WS3561330998
**Publication Date**: September 28, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: October 31, 2022, 14:00 MDT

### Project Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide electrical installation, repairs, and maintenance services for its Real Property Operations Group (West) – Det Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba.

### Requirement Details

* Services include the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials as requested by DND.
* The provision of electrical installation, repairs, and maintenance services are required on an as and when required basis.
* The contractor must possess the necessary security clearances and adhere to all relevant security requirements.

### Key Dates and Timeline

* Tender Closing Date: October 31, 2022, 14:00 MDT
* Contract Start Date: October 1, 2022
* Contract End Date: September 30, 2026
* Two-year contract with two optional one-year extensions.

### Evaluation Criteria and Selection Process

* Evaluation will be based on the lowest price offered by the contractor.

### Mandatory Requirements

* The contractor must have a Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) certification.
* The contractor is required to provide a complete bid package and all necessary supporting documentation by the tender closing date.

### Economic Requirements

* A minimum of 5% of the contract value must be subcontracted to Canadian-owned and controlled businesses.
* The contractor must have a satisfactory supplier diversity plan in place.

### Inquiries and Proposal Submission

* Proposals must be submitted through the Ariba Discovery website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14205529?extsite=MTQyMDU1MjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contractor inquiries can be addressed to Ben Wong, ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Security Requirements

* The contractor must comply with all relevant security regulations and obtain the necessary security clearances.
* All confidential information and documents must be protected and handled in accordance with security protocols.
